mapper.sql: id, username, password, phone, email, city, createtime, education, school, signature, gender, level, academy, vip, grade, lastLoginTime,imei,user.wechat
mapper.select:
select
from user
DATE_FORMAT(createtime,'%Y-%m-%d') = CURDATE() OR DATE_FORMAT(lastLoginTime,'%Y-%m-%d') = CURDATE()
LIMIT #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into user (id, username, password, phone, email, city, createtime, education, school, signature, gender, level, academy, vip, grade, lastLoginTime,androidId ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{academy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vip,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{grade,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{androidId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update user
username = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
imei = #{imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wechat = #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=CHAR},
createtime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
education = #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
school = #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
signature = #{signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=TINYINT},
level = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
academy = #{academy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
androidId = #{androidId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vip = #{vip,jdbcType=TINYINT},
grade = #{grade,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lastLoginTime = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set username = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, androidId = #{androidId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=CHAR}, createtime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, education = #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, school = #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, signature = #{signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=TINYINT}, level = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, academy = #{academy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vip = #{vip,jdbcType=TINYINT}, grade = #{grade,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lastLoginTime = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
